Main ones I have left are stopping the milk delivery getting robbed and uniting Anju and Kafei

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f395e6636872555fb40e00#post_54f395e6636872555fb40e00
What's a stromboli? Is it like a calzone? And what's a calzone?
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f398716368722455b70100#post_54f398716368722455b70100
Calzone is basically a pizza folded in half. Stromboli in my experience is the same as a calzone but with more toppings/fillings, less cheese and less sauce. 

Normal Stromboli seem to be more akin to what I posted above.
